sqlMap.insert:
MERGE INTO CPA_PSEXAM_MYP USING DUAL ON (PIN = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET AGREE_INFO1_YN = #agreeInfo1Yn#, AGREE_INFO2_YN = #agreeInfo2Yn#, KOREAN_NM = #koreanNm#, BRTHDY = #brthdy#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PIN, AGREE_INFO1_YN, AGREE_INFO2_YN, KOREAN_NM, BRTHDY, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT)
VALUES (#pin#, #agreeInfo1Yn#, #agreeInfo2Yn#, #koreanNm#, #brthdy#, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE CPA_PSEXAM_MYP SET CHCRT_NM = #chcrtNm# , CHCRT_NM2 = $chcrtNm2$ , ENG_NM = #engNm# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin#

UPDATE CPA_PSEXAM_MYP SET HUS_ADR_CL = #husAdrCl# , HUS_ZIP_CD = #husZipCd# , HUS_ADRES = #husAdres# , HUS_ADRES_DETAIL = #husAdresDetail# , HUS_LEGAL_CD = #husLegalCd# , OFC_ADR_CL = #ofcAdrCl# , OFC_ZIP_CD = #ofcZipCd# , OFC_ADRES = #ofcAdres# , OFC_ADRES_DETAIL = #ofcAdresDetail# , OFC_LEGAL_CD = #ofcLegalCd# , POST_SNDNG_YN = #postSndngYn# , OFC_TEL_NO = #ofcTelNo# , OFC_FAX_NO = #ofcFaxNo# , OFICE_NM = #oficeNm# , RSP_OFC = #rspOfc# , SECTION_NM = #sectionNm# , DEPT_NM = #deptNm# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin#

UPDATE CPA_PSEXAM_MYP SET MOBL_PHON_NO = #moblPhonNo# , HUS_TEL_NO = #husTelNo# , MAIN_EMAIL = #mainEmail# , SUB_EMAIL = #subEmail# , EMAIL_SNDNG_YN = #emailSndngYn# , SMS_SNDNG_YN = #smsSndngYn# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin#

MERGE INTO MBER_ACDMCR_MYP USING DUAL ON (ACDMCR_SN = #acdmcrSn# AND PIN = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SCHUL_CL = #schulCl#, DEGREE = #degree#, SCHUL_NM = #schulNm#, MAJOR = #major#, GRDTN_YEAR = #grdtnYear#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ACDMCR_SN, PIN, SCHUL_CL, DEGREE, SCHUL_NM, MAJOR, GRDTN_YEAR, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT)
VALUES (KIPADM.MBER_ACDMCR_MYP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #pin#, #schulCl#, #degree#, #schulNm#, #major#, #grdtnYear#, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP, #userId#, SYSTIMESTAMP)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT cpm.PIN , cpm.AGREE_INFO1_YN , cpm.AGREE_INFO2_YN , cpm.KOREAN_NM , cpm.CHCRT_NM , cpm.CHCRT_NM2 , cpm.ENG_NM , cpm.BRTHDY , cpm.HUS_ADR_CL , cpm.HUS_ZIP_CD , cpm.HUS_ADRES , cpm.HUS_ADRES_DETAIL , cpm.HUS_LEGAL_CD , cpm.OFC_ADR_CL , cpm.OFC_ZIP_CD , cpm.OFC_ADRES , cpm.OFC_ADRES_DETAIL , cpm.OFC_LEGAL_CD , cpm.POST_SNDNG_YN , CASE WHEN cpm.POST_SNDNG_YN = 'O' THEN '직장' ELSE '자택' END AS POST_SNDNG_NM , cpm.OFC_TEL_NO , cpm.OFC_FAX_NO , cpm.OFICE_NM , cpm.RSP_OFC , cpm.SECTION_NM , cpm.DEPT_NM , cpm.MOBL_PHON_NO , cpm.HUS_TEL_NO , cpm.MAIN_EMAIL , cpm.SUB_EMAIL , cpm.EMAIL_SNDNG_YN , cpm.SMS_SNDNG_YN , CASE WHEN cpm.EMAIL_SNDNG_YN = 'Y' THEN '수신' ELSE '미수신' END AS EMAIL_SNDNG_NM , CASE WHEN cpm.SMS_SNDNG_YN = 'Y' THEN '수신' ELSE '미수신' END AS SMS_SNDNG_NM , cpm.RSUM_FILE_NM , cpm.EVENTN , cpm.REG_FLAG
FROM CPA_PSEXAM_MYP cpm WHERE cpm.PIN = #pin#

SELECT mam.PIN , mam.SCHUL_CL , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA2230' AND cc.CD = mam.SCHUL_CL) AS SCHUL_CL_NM , mam.DEGREE , (SELECT cc.CD_NM FROM CMMN_CODE cc WHERE cc.GRP_CD ='GA9030' AND cc.CD = mam.DEGREE) AS DEGREE_NM , mam.SCHUL_NM , mam.MAJOR , mam.GRDTN_YEAR
FROM MBER_ACDMCR_MYP mam WHERE mam.PIN = #pin#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE CPA_PSEXAM_MYP SET REG_FLAG = #regFlag# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin#
sqlMap.select: SELECT PSEXAM_YEAR , TEST_CL , PASS_EDYC_NO , PASS_DE , PASS_CL_NO , PASS_FLAG , ORGIN_CTLF , NLTY , REMARK FROM CPA_PSEXAM WHERE PIN = #pin#
sqlMap.insert: MERGE INTO MBER_INDVDLINFO USING DUAL ON (PIN = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET KOREAN_NM = #koreanNm#, CHCRT_NM = #chcrtNm#, CHCRT_NM2 = $chcrtNm2$, ENG_NM = #engNm#, BRTHDY = #brthdy#, HOUSE_TEL_NO = #husTelNo#, MOBL_PHON_NO = #moblPhonNo#, MAIN_EMAIL = #mainEmail#, SUB_EMAIL = #subEmail#, EMAIL_SNDNG_YN = #emailSndngYn#, SMS_SNDNG_YN = #smsSndngYn#, POST_SNDNG_YN = #postSndngYn# , REG_FLAG = #regFlag# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (PIN, KOREAN_NM, CHCRT_NM, CHCRT_NM2, ENG_NM, SEX, BRTHDY, HOUSE_TEL_NO, MOBL_PHON_NO, MAIN_EMAIL, SUB_EMAIL, EMAIL_SNDNG_YN, SMS_SNDNG_YN, POST_SNDNG_YN, REG_FLAG, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (#pin# , #koreanNm# , #chcrtNm# , $chcrtNm2$ , #engNm# , #sex# , #brthdy# , #husTelNo# , #moblPhonNo#, #mainEmail#, #subEmail#, #emailSndngYn#, #smsSndngYn#, #postSndngYn#, #regFlag#, #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)

MERGE INTO ADRES_INFO USING DUAL ON (ADR_CL = #adrCl# AND ADR_TRG_CL = #adrTrgCl# AND ADR_TRG_ID = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
ZIP_CD = #husZipCd#, RD_ADRES = #husAdres# , RD_ADRES_DETAIL = #husAdresDetail#, LEGAL_CD = #husLegalCd#,
ZIP_CD = #ofcZipCd#, RD_ADRES = #ofcAdres# , RD_ADRES_DETAIL = #ofcAdresDetail#, LEGAL_CD = #ofcLegalCd#,
REGIST_DE = #registDe#, REGIST_Cl = #registCl#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ADR_CL, ADR_TRG_CL, ADR_TRG_ID, ZIP_CD, RD_ADRES, RD_ADRES_DETAIL,LEGAL_CD, REGIST_DE, REGIST_Cl, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (#adrCl# , #adrTrgCl# , #pin# ,
#husZipCd# , #husAdres# , #husAdresDetail#, #husLegalCd#,
#ofcZipCd# , #ofcAdres# , #ofcAdresDetail#, #ofcLegalCd#,
#registDe#, #registCl#, #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)

MERGE INTO OFICE_INFO USING DUAL ON (OFC_CL = #ofcCl# AND OFC_TRG_ID = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET OFC_TEL_NO = #ofcTelNo#, OFC_FAX_NO = #ofcFaxNo#, OFICE_NM = #oficeNm#, SECTION_NM = #sectionNm# , DEPT_NM = #deptNm#, RSP_OFC = #rspOfc#, OPETR_DE = #registDe#, REGIST_Cl = #registCl#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (OFC_CL, OFC_TRG_ID, OFC_TEL_NO, OFC_FAX_NO, OFICE_NM, SECTION_NM, DEPT_NM, RSP_OFC, OPETR_DE, REGIST_Cl, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (#ofcCl# , #pin# , #ofcTelNo# , #ofcFaxNo# , #oficeNm# , #sectionNm# , #deptNm# , #rspOfc#, #registDe#, #registCl#, #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)

MERGE INTO MBER_RSUM USING DUAL ON (REGIST_DE = #registDe# AND PIN = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET EVENTN = #eventn#, RSUM_FILE = (SELECT RSUM_FILE FROM CPA_PSEXAM_MYP WHERE PIN=#pin#) , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (REGIST_DE, PIN, EVENTN, RSUM_FILE, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (#registDe# , #pin# , #eventn#, (SELECT RSUM_FILE FROM CPA_PSEXAM_MYP WHERE PIN=#pin#), #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)

MERGE INTO MBER_ACDMCR USING DUAL ON (ACDMCR_SN = #acdmcrSn#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SCHUL_CL = #schulCl#, DEGREE = #degree#, SCHUL_NM = #schulNm#, MAJOR = #major# , GRDTN_YEAR = #grdtnYear#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ACDMCR_SN, PIN, SCHUL_CL, DEGREE, SCHUL_NM, MAJOR, GRDTN_YEAR, DELETE_YN, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (KIPADM.MBER_ACDMCR_SEQ.nextval , #pin# , #schulCl# , #degree# , #schulNm# , #major# , #grdtnYear# , #deleteYn#, #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE MBER_INDVDLINFO SET CHCRT_NM = #chcrtNm# , CHCRT_NM2 = $chcrtNm2$ , ENG_NM = #engNm# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin#

MERGE INTO ADRES_INFO USING DUAL ON (ADR_CL = #adrCl# AND ADR_TRG_CL = #adrTrgCl# AND ADR_TRG_ID = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET
ZIP_CD = #husZipCd#, RD_ADRES = #husAdres# , RD_ADRES_DETAIL = #husAdresDetail#, LEGAL_CD = #husLegalCd#,
ZIP_CD = #ofcZipCd#, RD_ADRES = #ofcAdres# , RD_ADRES_DETAIL = #ofcAdresDetail#, LEGAL_CD = #ofcLegalCd#,
REGIST_DE = #registDe#, REGIST_Cl = #registCl#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ADR_CL, ADR_TRG_CL, ADR_TRG_ID, ZIP_CD, RD_ADRES, RD_ADRES_DETAIL,LEGAL_CD, REGIST_DE, REGIST_Cl, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (#adrCl# , #adrTrgCl# , #pin# ,
#husZipCd# , #husAdres# , #husAdresDetail#, #husLegalCd#,
#ofcZipCd# , #ofcAdres# , #ofcAdresDetail#, #ofcLegalCd#,
#registDe#, #registCl#, #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)

MERGE INTO OFICE_INFO USING DUAL ON (OFC_CL = #adrTrgCl# AND OFC_TRG_ID = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET OFC_TEL_NO = #ofcTelNo#, OFC_FAX_NO = #ofcFaxNo#, OFICE_NM = #oficeNm#, SECTION_NM = #sectionNm# , DEPT_NM = #deptNm#, RSP_OFC = #rspOfc#, OPETR_DE = #registDe#, REGIST_Cl = #registCl#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (OFC_CL, OFC_TRG_ID, OFC_TEL_NO, OFC_FAX_NO, OFICE_NM, SECTION_NM, DEPT_NM, RSP_OFC, OPETR_DE, REGIST_Cl, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (#adrTrgCl# , #pin# , #ofcTelNo# , #ofcFaxNo# , #oficeNm# , #sectionNm# , #deptNm# , #rspOfc#, #registDe#, #registCl#, #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)

UPDATE MBER_INDVDLINFO SET POST_SNDNG_YN = #postSndngYn# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin#

UPDATE MBER_INDVDLINFO SET HOUSE_TEL_NO = #husTelNo# , MOBL_PHON_NO = #moblPhonNo# , MAIN_EMAIL = #mainEmail# , SUB_EMAIL = #subEmail# , EMAIL_SNDNG_YN = #emailSndngYn# , SMS_SNDNG_YN = #smsSndngYn# , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE PIN = #pin#

MERGE INTO MBER_ACDMCR USING DUAL ON (ACDMCR_SN = #acdmcrSn# AND PIN = #pin#) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET SCHUL_CL = #schulCl#, DEGREE = #degree#, SCHUL_NM = #schulNm#, MAJOR = #major# , GRDTN_YEAR = #grdtnYear#, LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId#, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (ACDMCR_SN, PIN, SCHUL_CL, DEGREE, SCHUL_NM, MAJOR, GRDTN_YEAR, DELETE_YN, FRST_REGIST_ID, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDT_ID, LAST_UPDT_DT) VALUES (KIPADM.MBER_ACDMCR_SEQ.nextval , #pin# , #schulCl# , #degree# , #schulNm# , #major# , #grdtnYear# , #deleteYn#, #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)

UPDATE MBER_ACDMCR SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' , LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE ACDMCR_SN = #acdmcrSnDel# AND PIN = #pin#

UPDATE CPA c SET c.CLOSED_CL = #closedCl# , c.LAST_UPDT_ID = #userId# , c.LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSTIMESTAMP
WHERE c.PIN = #pin# AND c.CPA_SN = (SELECT MAX(CPA_SN) FROM CPA WHERE PIN = #pin#)
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO CPA_HIST(
CPA_HIST_SN , CPA_SN , UPDT_CL , REGIST_DE , LAST_REGIST_DE , EXTRL_AUD_CL , EXTRL_AUD_DE , BIZR_NO , CLOSED_CL , DELETE_YN , FRST_REGIST_ID , FRST_REGIST_DT , LAST_UPDT_ID , LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES( KIPADM.CPA_HIST_SEQ.nextval , #cpaSn# , #updtCl# , #registDe# , #lastRegistDe# , #extrlAudCl# , #extrlAudDe# , #bizrNo# , #closedCl# , #deleteYn# , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP , #userId# , SYSTIMESTAMP)
